document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Qalil River on Suq Bay.
document_data.name: Al-Qalil River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Qalil River''', also called the '''Insufficient Flow''' perhaps because of its small size, was a waterway found in the northern region of the [[Cities of the Heart]] in [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: Al-Qalil River originated in the foothills of the southernmost tier of the [[Ghost Mountains]]. The river flowed west briefly before reaching the northern reaches of [[Suq Bay]]. The city of [[Wasat]] was found along its banks at its mouth.
